channel.title: How do i give out my client?
channel.description:
Hello. I'm new to the making of Rune Scape private servers and stuff that revolve around that. If i may ask, it be a noob question but everyone starts somewhere, How do i let other people play my server using my MoparScape client/source? Do i just upload the Source i use along with the Mopar Source or what? I understand you need No-Ip as i already have that just dont know what to do now.
Im sorry if this thread is posted in the wrong section, i realized i posted it in the wrong section. My fault.

item.title: How do i give out my client?
item.dc:creator: @Project_TK Project TK
item.description:
@Project_TK wrote:

[quote=“atrix676, post:2, topic:270111”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html
detailed instructions for makeing a server.[/quote]yea that’s what i used its very helpfull pretty sure it will help him if you have any questions ask me

Read full topic

item.title: How do i give out my client?
item.dc:creator: @ug1yw4t3rm3l0n ug1yw4t3rm3l0n
item.description:
@ug1yw4t3rm3l0n wrote:

Free ones and easy one is use mediafire.com You can upload without an account and all files uploaded will be saved,
Megaupload just sign up
UPPIT not sure
THese are the top 3 iv seen used

Read full topic

item.title: How do i give out my client?
item.dc:creator: @minnergod1 minnergod1
item.description:
@minnergod1 wrote:

Nickalbokid96:

That really doesnt help me much sorry, I’ve already followed those steps and i have played on my server but i want to know how to give it to other people and let other people play it?

You just have to portforward at www.portforwarding.com
and then post your server ip on like the server status here or runlocus and ppl should be able to get on and if they cant pm me and ill see if i can find out what the problem is I’ve only had it not work for me once but ive fixed that already.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i give out my client?

item.title: How do i give out my client?
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

to give ur client u compress it and put it on an uploading site such as:
uppit.com or
mediafire.com

and give them the download link for it…

Read full topic
